original_title: Main suspect in killing of woman and her baby girl arrested
original_body_lines: The main suspect in the killing of the 24-year-old woman and her 11 months old baby girl, has been arrested by the police yesterday.
Police recovered the bodies of the woman and the baby who had gone missing a few days ago from a jungle area at Rathmalgoda in Anguruwathota, Horana.
Police said the arrested suspect is the brother-in-law of the dead woman.
They said the suspect was injured after he stabbed himself with a scissor when police tried to arrest him.
He is currently receiving treatment under police custody at the Horana Hospital.
